snippet: The comedian Bill Cosby was sued Tuesday by a Southern California woman who says he molested her in a bedroom of the Playboy Mansion in Los Angeles around 1974 when she was 15.
abstract: Southern California woman Judy Huth sues comedian Bill Cosby, alleging that he molested her in a bedroom of Playboy Mansion in Los Angeles around 1974 when she was 15.
lead_paragraph: The comedian Bill Cosby was sued Tuesday by a Southern California woman who says he molested her in a bedroom of the Playboy Mansion in Los Angeles around 1974 when she was 15.

headline.main: California: Lawsuit Against Cosby Alleges Abuse at 15
headline.print_headline: California: Lawsuit Against Cosby Alleges Abuse at 15
